title: Please Organize Red Tracker Into Categories
body: Now personally I don't mind if Reds talk to the fans. I encourage it and hope it continues. But creating so many posts in a social thread that buries the more informative posts is bad.

replies.body: First, for some reason I find your name pretty sweet. Second, yes we will be addressing the Red Tracker. [More details are here ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback/Ycc11N8g-fix-the-red-tracker?comment=0001)and I encourage if you have more ideas or thoughts to add them there!

I was actually talking about it but felt weird mentioning it by name. I'm not saying anything bad should happen to the guy, but please allow us to filter what type of responses we want to read. I'm a lore fan. I want to be able to track posts about the story. Others want posts about game design.

I'm unsure of why this was downvoted.  I would love to be able to sort the Red Tracker based on the posts I find important, rather than having to see every single thing that is ever said by a Rioter.

As an example, go look at the Red Tracker.  There are 241 posts in a row from Riot Superfoxman, none of which carry any particular value to those not interested in frivolous conversation.
